Description.description: Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as address, phone number, activities, and orders.
The currency amount that has been allocated to related Designation Plans against this opportunity.
Value of the Actual Ask Amount in base currency.
The amount of realized designation credits that have been paid against the designation plan created. The designation credit represents the payment created as a result of a transaction
Value of the Realized in base currency.
The related appeal that the solicitation is supporting
The current stage of the opportunity
The related event that the opportunity is supporting
The sum of all related parent Designation Plans for this opportunity.
Value of the Expected Amount in base currency.
Populated by trigger, displays the sum of all Expected Giving Amounts.
Value of the Expected Giving Amount in base currency.
The date of the first report for this opportunity.
The date of the last report for this opportunity.
The number of reports for this opportunity.
The primary objective for this opportunity
Default Designation
The related opportunity manager assigned to this solicitation, this is a user of the system and is different than the solicitor
The package this transaction is related to. The package is filtered by the appeal record. Only packages that are assigned to the appeal in question can be used.
A marker that indicates the related donor commitment has been created by the process. This prevents the button form appearing when the process has already completed.
A marker that indicates the related donor commitment has been created by the process. This prevents the button form appearing when the process has already completed.
The date the related donor commitment has been created from the process
The stored GUID of the form used to load the opportunity. If a value exists, the form will ensure that record loads with the Form Identifier specified in this field.
Primary Proposal
The field that marks this opportunity has been set as 'Set Committed" which indicates the donor commitment can be created from this opportunity
The field that marks this opportunity has been set as 'Set Committed" which indicates the donor commitment can be created from this opportunity
The date the opportunity has been marked as 'Set Committed" which indicative the donor commitment can be created from this opportunity

Giving Type being solicited (Renewal, Additional, etc) or communication medium to donor (TV, Radio, Raffle, etc). This value is copied from associated Campaign at gift creation, and can be manually changed if necessary.

Giving Type being solicited (Renewal, Additional, etc) or communication medium to donor (TV, Radio, Raffle, etc). This value is copied from associated Campaign at gift creation, and can be manually changed if necessary.
The related solicitor that has been assigned to the related customer or contact
Transaction Amount Allocated to this Opportunity
Value of the Allocated in base currency.
The total committed from any related ‘Donor Commitments’
Value of the Total Committed in base currency.
Choose whether an individual or a committee will be involved in the purchase process for the lead.
